thread.title: Leftfield to play Birmingham's Institute tonight
thread.title_full: Leftfield to play Birmingham's Institute tonight

title: Leftfield to play Birmingham's Institute tonight
text:
Be the first to comment 
Leftfield, now led solely by Neil Barnes, are one of electronic music’s all time greatest acts, and Alternative Light Source is the follow up to Leftism (1995) and Rhythm and Stealth (1999), both of which were nominated for the Mercury Prize. Alongside Sleaford Mods, the record contains collaborations with Ofei, Tunde Adebimpe (TV On The Radio) and Channy Leaneagh of Poliça. 
The band have received starry reviews with DJ Mag writing: ‘Leftfield is ahead of the curve, even now’ – 9/10, The Guardian saying: ‘Beauty and ecstasy – an impressive return’. For more information on events in and around Birmingham click here . Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star
